# subscript(section:)

**Instance Subscript**

The customization of the section, identified by its customization identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(section id: String) -> TabViewCustomization.SectionCustomization { get set }
```

## Overview

Section tab order can be read by subscripting with the tab section’s id:

```swift
let order = customization[section: "com.myApp.categories"].tabOrder
```

To reset the order of an individual section, use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewCustomization/SectionCustomization/resetTabOrder()]. To reset the order of all sections, use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewCustomization/resetSectionOrder()].
